entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -32.3°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
